title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 537 - Bulk Sales
content:

State Regulations
§ 537.0 - General information
§ 537.1 - Definitions
§ 537.2 - Notice of sale, transfer or assignment in bulk of business assets
§ 537.3 - Purchaser's, transferee's or assignee's rights and obligations
§ 537.4 - Purchaser's, transferee's or assignee's liability
§ 537.5 - Seller's, transferrer's or assignor's rights, obligations and liabilities
§ 537.6 - Obligations of the Department of Taxation and Finance
§ 537.8 - Purchaser's, transferee's or assignee's rights to hearing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 537

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 1141[c], 1142, 1250

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
